qas.question: On what date did British Somaliland gain independence?
What was British Somaliland known as upon achieving independence?
What state formed the Somali Republic with British Somaliland?
On what date did the former British Somaliland and Italian Somaliland unite?
Who was the first President of the Somali Republic?

context: British Somaliland became independent on <a0_0>26 June 1960<a0_0/> as <a1_0>the State of Somaliland<a1_0/>, and <a2_0>the Trust Territory of Somalia<a2_0/> (the former Italian Somaliland) followed suit five days later. On <a3_0>1 July 1960<a3_0/>, the two territories united to form the Somali Republic, albeit within boundaries drawn up by Italy and Britain. A government was formed by Abdullahi Issa Mohamud and Muhammad Haji Ibrahim Egal other members of the trusteeship and protectorate governments, with Haji Bashir Ismail Yusuf as President of the Somali National Assembly, <a4_0>Aden Abdullah Osman Daar<a4_0/> as the President of the Somali Republic and Abdirashid Ali Shermarke as Prime Minister (later to become President from 1967 to 1969). On 20 July 1961 and through a popular referendum, the people of Somalia ratified a new constitution, which was first drafted in 1960. In 1967, Muhammad Haji Ibrahim Egal became Prime Minister, a position to which he was appointed by Shermarke. Egal would later become the President of the autonomous Somaliland region in northwestern Somalia.
